about_the_game:
This is a set of two wallpapers in three resolutions for your computer - HD, UHD, and 4K, featuring Mafuyu.

MyGF will always be free and you do not require this DLC to play the game.

By purchasing these wallpapers you will be helping me continue to create more games and fund my future creative endeavors.

HOW TO ACCESS WALLPAPERS

The wallpapers are downloaded on MyGF's installation folder, inside the 'MyGF Digital Extras' folder.
Right click the game, then Manage > Browse local files.
